headline.main: WAVELL ENVISAGES MID-EAST AS ARENA; Says British and Russians Prepare for Any Fighting in That Area in 1942

lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI, India, Nov. 20 -- "The Caucasus, Iran, Iraq and Syria may well prove to be the great battlefield of 1942," said General Sir Archibald P. Wavell, British commander in chief in India, in an interview here today.
abstract: Wavell on Middle East as possible battlefield

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
